dlgPart.npc_text: The very first thing you see when you arrive is a group of armed men shouting threats across a chasm separating them from a small village sitting on the side of the mountain. Shouting threats is all they can do at the moment as the makeshift bridge has been removed and all attempts to get closer are met with arrows.

You're greeted by silence. It doesn't take you long to realize that the village has been raided, its defenders slain, the culprits long gone.
You aren't sure now why you thought that the raiders would sit on their asses and wait for you for weeks. Everyone's in a rush these days. They want it all and they want it now. Oh well...
